column2: The people have decided to rise up against their overlords, overthrow them, and found a new republic.
The people have decided to rise up against their overlords, overthrow them, and found a new military state.
The people have decided to rise up against their overlords, overthrow them, and found a new technocratic state.
This character is a major power figure in an ongoing popular revolt.
This character has ignored their subordinates' requests for military assistance and abandoned them to their enemies, greatly weakening their standing in the eyes of their other subordinates.

The people of this system are in open revolt against the government. The government's control over the system is purely nominal at this point, but as the rebels have already claimed all the ships they can get their hands on, it is unlikely to cause additional trouble for some time.
The people of this system are celebrating the recent victory of the revolution against the old, corrupt regime. The system is unlikely to cause any trouble for the new government for some time.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the system's government, claiming they want to establish a new democratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the sector government, claiming they want to establish a new democratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the regional government, claiming they want to establish a new democratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the federal government, claiming they want to establish a new democratic government in its place.
Partisans from the [Root.GetName] System have joined an ongoing democratic rebellion.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the system's government, claiming they want to establish a new autocratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the sector government, claiming they want to establish a new autocratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the regional government, claiming they want to establish a new autocratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the federal government, claiming they want to establish a new autocratic government in its place.
Partisans from the [Root.GetName] System have joined an ongoing autocratic rebellion.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the system's government, claiming they want to establish a new theocratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the sector government, claiming they want to establish a new theocratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the regional government, claiming they want to establish a new theocratic government in its place.
The people of the [Root.GetName] System have launched a rebelling against the federal government, claiming they want to establish a new theocratic government in its place.
Partisans from the [Root.GetName] System have joined an ongoing theocratic rebellion.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]\nFROM: [From.GetFullName], [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]\nAs commander-in-chief of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], I have assumed command of our military operations against your corrupt regime. Inform us of your unconditional surrender and you will not be harmed.
We should call on the [Root.Liege.GetTitle] for assistance.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Civil unrest
There has been a recent outbreak of civil unrest in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], but we have the situation under control. There is no need to involve yourself.
considers your request for military assistance.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Terrorist action
We have recently suffered several attacks from a terrorist organization calling themselves the [From.From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and our own security forces cannot handle the situation. We request immediate assistance.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Terrorist action
I have mobilized the fleet. We are coming to your assistance.
The traitors are in for it now!

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Terrorist action
Regretably, we do not have the free manpower or materiel to assist you with your situation. Look to your defenses.
THIS is how [From.GetSheHe] repays my loyalty?!
More rebel partisans have joined forces with the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], bringing with them more ships and manpower. The situation could be getting out of hand.
